name: Critical
description: Urgent issue that prevents work from continuing

name: High
description: Important issue that needs to be resolved as soon as possible

name: Medium
description: Issue that needs attention but does not affect work

name: Low
description: Minor issue that does not have a significant impact

name: Informational
description: General information that does not require action

name: Emergency
description: Immediate action required to prevent harm or danger

name: Feature Request
description: Request for new feature or enhancement

name: Bug
description: Error or mistake in the system
